text:
Death toll

climbs to nine

Death toll in the accident involving a government bus and a lorry on the Pollachi-Palladam Road on Monday, climbed to nine on Thursday.

While eight of them died the same day, P. Vaithiyalingam (65) of Puliyangudi, in Tirunelveli districtdied at the Coimbatore

Medical College

Hospital on Thursday afternoon.

Youth gets life term

for murder

The Principal District Judge of The Nilgiris convicted a 24-year-old youth and sentenced him to life imprisonment for killing a labourer. Public Prosecutor K. Ananthakrishnan said that Balakrishnan (34), of Manjanakorai near Udhagamandalam, was attacked by Nishanth using a stone during a verbal duel on July 1, 2012.

Balakrishnan was admitted in Udhagamandalam Government Hospital, where he died.

The police booked Nishanth under section 302 (murder) of the Indian Penal Code and arrested him.

He was granted bail a month later.

The judge, A.A. Nakeeran, imposed a fine of Rs. 2,000 too on him.
